item.title: SSL Certificate with Certbot
item.description: Requirements Debian, Apache2, Snapd, Certbot Install First, update your repositories sudo apt update -y Install snapd sudo apt install snapd -y install certbot sudo snap install certbot --classic Create symbolic link so you can run certbot command from the terminal Run certbot command sudo certbot --apache you can change “–apache” to “–nginx” if you are using nginx instead of apache Enter your valid email address so certbot can contact you for renewal and security notices
